structuredOutputParser.label: Structured Output Parser
structuredOutputParser.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a given (JSON) structure.

autofixParser.label: Autofix
autofixParser.description: In the event that the first call fails, will make another call to the model to fix any errors.

jsonStructure.label: JSON Structure
jsonStructure.description: JSON structure for LLM to return

structuredOutputParserAdvanced.label: Structured Output Parser Advanced
structuredOutputParserAdvanced.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a given (JSON) structure with advanced features.

autofixParser.label: Autofix
autofixParser.description: In the event that the first call fails, will make another call to the model to fix any errors.

jsonStructure.label: JSON Structure
jsonStructure.description: JSON structure for LLM to return

partialStructuredOutputParser.label: Partial Structured Output Parser
partialStructuredOutputParser.description: Enable partial parsing for streaming responses

csvListOutputParser.label: CSV List Output Parser
csvListOutputParser.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a CSV list.

separator.label: Separator
separator.description: The separator to use for the CSV list. Default is comma.

customListOutputParser.label: Custom List Output Parser
customListOutputParser.description: Parse the output of an LLM call into a custom list format.

separator.label: Separator
separator.description: The separator to use for the list. Default is newline.

length.label: Length
length.description: Expected length of the list. If not provided, will return all items.
